name: Aggie Miracle
description:
Aggie Miracle is a student-run philanthropy that heightens awareness and raises funds for McLane Children’s Medical
Center in Temple, a Children’s Miracle Network Hospital right in our backyard. Aggie Miracle hosts a philanthropy event
called Dance Marathon, which takes place the first weekend of March each year. DM 2018 will be on March 3 rd , 2018!
Dance Marathon was brought to Texas A&M by the Aggie Belles four short years ago and has grown so much that it
became its own organization—Aggie Miracle. In order to organize and oversee a successful event, the Aggie Miracle
team works hard all year—from Spring to Spring! While you may have never attended DM or another Dance Marathon
before, everything you put into this organization will come full circle as the year wraps up and at the event in March.
summary:
Aggie Miracle is a student-run philanthropy that heightens awareness and raises funds for McLane Children’s Medical
Center in Temple, a Children’s Miracle Network Hospital right in our backyard.
